title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.16 - Executive Order No. 16: [Directive to hold public hearings on matters involving the management and administration of public schools in the City of New York.]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.16 - Executive Order No. 16: [Directive to hold public hearings on matters involving the management and administration of public schools in the City of New York.]
State Regulations
WHEREAS, by Executive Order dated September 8, 1962, Herman
T. Stichman was constituted as a Special Commissioner and it was directed, among other things, that the Attorney General of the State inquire into certain
matters involving the public peace, public safety and public justice, pursuant
to subdivision 8 of Section
63
of the

Executive Law; and
WHEREAS, the Attorney General, as requested in the

Executive order, duly appointed the Special Commissioner as a Special Assistant

Attorney General, and has duly appointed certain deputies and other persons to
aid and assist the Special Commissioner in the conduct of the inquiry as
contemplated by the Executive Order; and
WHEREAS, the Special Commissioner and Special Assistant

Attorney General has been conducting an inquiry into matters involving the
management and administration of the public schools in the City of New York; and
WHEREAS, on the basis of information submitted to me by the

Special Commissioner and Special Assistant Attorney General concerning the said
inquiry, I deem it in the public interest and in aid of my functions and duties
as Governor of the State of New York that a public hearing be held with respect
to the subject matter of the said inquiry and that information obtained upon
the said inquiry be publicly disclosed. NOW, THEREFORE, I hereby authorize and direct Herman T. Stichman, Special Commissioner and Special Assistant Attorney General, with the
aid and assistance of the said deputies and other persons appointed by the

Attorney General, to hold public hearings with respect to the subject matter of
the said inquiry and in the course of said hearings to disclose publicly
information obtained upon the said inquiry. Signed: Nelson A. Rockefeller

Dated: December 6, 1963

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
